title: Bajaj Finance raises deposit rates for 2nd time in month - Economic Times
content:
1. Bajaj Finance raises deposit rates for 2nd time in month  Economic Times
  2. HDFC, Bajaj Finance hike FD interest  Times of India
  3. Bajaj Finance raises interest rates on fixed deposits by up to 10 bps  Business Standard
  4. Here's All You Should Know About Hike In Fd Rates By Bajaj Finance  Mint
  5. Bajaj Finance increase in FD Rate effective from today  Indiainfoline
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Individuals, who put money for tenures of 33, 36-40 and 44 months will now earn 6.75%, 7% and 7.20%, respectively. Senior citizens can earn 25 basis points higher than this, taking the rates to 7.45% for a 44- month period.
